title: Pixel Art Contest!
body:
http://imgur.com/Qx1o6iK

Hey Summoners!

Arcade Ahri is rushing into the Rift and we thought it would be great to run a contest to add to the festivities! There’s a bit of a twist though, it has to be pixel art! Don’t worry there are a lot of pixel art makers out there (You will find them with a quick google search).

We want to see your best pixel artworks of League of Legends champions (skins are okay too) or monsters and minions.

**Examples**

Teemo
http://imgur.com/qYBOVuQ

Shyvana
http://www.deviantart.com/art/Pixel-League-Shyvana-Large-514518114

Credit - http://veigarthegreat.deviantart.com/

**How will winners be selected?**
We’ll select the shortlist based on the quality of the submission, originality of the piece and whether the entry follows the contest rules! Players will then get to vote and decide who the 10 winners are.

**Dates**
The contest submission period starts today and ends on 10th September at 11:59PM AEDT, 2016. On September 12th, we’ll announce a short list of pieces for you to vote on. Voting will close on September 15th at 11:59PM AEDT, 2016. Winners will be announced on September 16th on the Boards.

**Submission methods**
You can submit your art work here - http://woobox.com/b7zrgw

**Contest Rules:**

* Your must: Depict at least one League of Legends Champion/skin or Monsters/Minions and it must be done in a pixel art style
* Your entry must be appropriate for players of all ages: League’s rated M, so nothing too risqué or of a violent nature
* Your entry can’t include any logos, advertisements, product names, or product placements: we don’t want Gragas, Esq. writing us any cease and desist letters!
* Your entry must be made by you, submitted by you, and made for this contest: this is about YOU showing YOUR artistic talents specifically for this contest
* Your entry must be submitted in the correct format and size: we're only taking submissions formatted in .jpg or .png; the maximum file size is 5MB and suggested minimum dimensions 20px by 20px
* You must have read and agree to the official contest rules: or your entry may be viewed as invalid. The master rules can be found [here](http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/page/contest-master-rules).
* The contest submission period starts today and ends on 10th September at 11:59PM AEDT, 2016. On September 12th, we’ll announce a short list of pieces for you to vote on. Voting will close on September 15th at 11:59PM AEDT, 2016. Winners will be announced on September 16th on the Boards.

**Prizes
Short list**
10 Hextech chests & keys

**Top 10 shortlisted entries with the most votes**
5 more hextech chests & keys
Arcade Skin of choice (non legendary) or Mystery skin

If you have any questions post below!

replies.body: 'On June 12th, we’ll announce a short list of pieces for you to vote on. '  same June ok next year then?
Nice catch. Its been updated to the right date! I definitely did that on purpose to make sure you were all reading...yeah...thats what it was.

> Your must: Depict a League of Legends Champion/skin or Monsters/Minions and it must be done in a pixel art style

That rule is a little unclear to me. Can you only do ONE champion/skin or monster/minion in the artwork? You can't have more than one champ in the work?
You can have more than one, it just to include a champion/monster or minion. I will clarify that now!
Since it's pixel art, would we have to resize it to make it a bigger image to fit the minimum dimensions?
disregard the old sizing rule in there, that was an error. =D look forward to seeing your awesome pixel art.
I can't wait to vote, gimme shortlist nowwww! ヽ(◕o◕ヽ)
Yeah Chris!
Can 2 people submit as 1 design together? And if so, how will the reward be split?
Hey, we won't be splitting rewards. You can only submit with one summoner name who will receive all the rewards.

By the way, can I make champions do poses? and like instead of normal splash art, can I make it out of skin? For example I make Arcade Ahri doing a random dash pose or throwing a charm pose. (Bad at english SORRY! )
You can definitely do different poses! we don't want to see just a pixel version of our splash arts. Originality is a key part too!
Thanks cool!!! Thanks for the clearing my question up ^.^{{champion:103}}
Can we create our own skin to do a pixel art on?

> [{quoted}](name=Maraudaur,realm=OCE,application-id=hIjvqaz6,discussion-id=28E6ZOUG,comment-id=00140000,timestamp=2016-08-25T10:56:10.330+0000)
>
> Existing skins and champions this time. Look forward to your awesome entry!

Sadly not
So approximately what would be the biggest size that you can do? pixel wise
Update - I will be adjusting the size rule tomorrow! thanks for the feedback.

When you say "suggested minimum dimensions" do you mean:

* We recommend this size but if it's a little smaller no worries ( as long as it isn't too small)

OR:

* Make your image at least this size or it will be disqualified

I think some {{summoner:13}}  is needed there

My contribution {{champion:245}} : http://s3-external-1.amazonaws.com/offertabs/offer/b7zrgw/uploads/57be9b0cab730-ekko_pixelart_runawayfetus.png?AWSAccessKeyId=AKIAJQENZWM3WVIJKG2A&Expires=1474701519&Signature=gibWSigci6FJ494v7OY9sujxk6o%3D

Goodluck everyone else in OCE :)
Hey are you able to submit just the pixel art piece? thanks!

"suggested minimum dimensions are 2339x1654px and 200 dpi resolution"
Isn't 2339x1654px waaaaaaay too large for pixel art?
what about people who can easily just photoshop a picture onto after effects and put in the mosaic effect which pixelizes it?

Those will not be accepted, there are tonnes of Pixel art makers out there I would highly recommend using those

e.g. https://www.pixilart.net/draw and 
http://pixelartmaker.com/
Yeah! as long as the end product is League of Legends pixel art its okay.

For those prizes, i really wish i could do pixel art.

I will probably submit a shitty looking pixel art just for the chance of Arcade Ahri.
You can do it! there are tutorials on youtube and pixel makers out there like this one - http://pixelartmaker.com/ (more if you google as well)

should be working what error message are you getting? *** edit this is the one you are looking for though, 2017 - https://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-creations/KY4p4EOX-pixel-art-contest-2017
The link in the 2017 post is working me. If you are having issues submitting in the 2017 contest. Drop a comment in that thread and we will try sort it out.
How do we get to vote?
vote by heading over to the facebook album and liking your favourite submissions =D
how do we vote
On September 12th, we’ll announce a short list of pieces for you to vote on.
Did the submission I entered (the yorick one) count as pixel art?
If we enter multiple times, are we still only eligible for one prize? Or can we possibly get shortlisted twice?
each person will only be eligible for one prize.

I'm seeing some traced images of official splasharts?, this shouldn't be allowed cause its unfair to people who manually go in and make their own drawings from scratch. It's alright if they get shortlisted this time since its not specified but could this be included in rules for future contests?
max file size is 5mb. But remember to keep it with a Pixel art feel.
I noticed a mistake in my submission. Am I allowed to fix it and submit again?
you can submit again

To what extent does it have to be pixels, like I have this background that's pixel based but I used a gradient color on it which inst exactly fully "pixels"... Is that allowed since it's just the background?
Ideally we would like it all to be pixel based.
Just wondering, but is there is a maximum colour count(since it is pixel art after all!)?
Unfortunately not.
Is there a limit to how many art works we can submit? {{champion:267}}
You can enter more than one piece. but remember to focus on Quality over Quantity =D
